Overview

Routines written while counting galaxies. All routines may be downloaded from ajs.tar.gz. Questions, comments, etc - send them this way: A.J.Smith at sussex.ac.uk (replace "at" with @ symbol).

Requirements. Some routines require you to have other routines installed. In my IDL path I have

  • The IDL Astronomy User's Library
  • Coyote Program Library (David Fanning)
  • IDLUTILS
  • kcorrect
  • The IDL Group K User's Library
  • One or two things from Michael Galloy
  • One or two things from JD Smith
  • Sample programs from Practical IDL Programming by Liam E. Gumley
  • And probably a few other routines.

Return to Anthony's homepage...
